description:
Bobbi starts out looking very proper & businesslike in her smart suit. Once I get my hands on her all bets are off. Here is your New Years gift from Hogtied to you...
Watch as Bobbi's clothing is ripped from her sexy body as she is made to endure clips, clamps and stress positions as she cums over & over again. With her beauty glowing through her screams you may at first feel sorry for her but worry not, the feeling will go away the longer you watch her suffer...
title: Bobbi Starr starts off the New Year screaming in orgasm
